medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Onset of sharp and non-radiating abdominal pain starting at 10pm last night. Pain migrated to the right lower quadrant (RLQ) this morning, associated with nausea and dry-heaving. Denies changes in bowel function, fevers, hematochezia/melena.
medical_history.past_medical_history: History of hypothyroidism and celiac disease. Previous bilateral shoulder surgery for frozen shoulder and right wrist surgery post-trauma.
medical_history.family_history: Mother with colon cancer diagnosed at an unspecified age, died at an unspecified age.
